requirement: Null/missing values - Required fields must not be empty
Uniqueness - Primary keys and unique fields must be unique across table
Format/length validation - Data must match specified formats (phone numbers, emails, account numbers, etc.)
Foreign key integrity - All foreign key references must exist in parent tables
Transactions more than 10M VND must use strong auth (biometric or OTP) - per 2345/QĐ-NHNN 2023
Device must be verified if new or untrusted - Active devices must be trusted/verified
Total transaction amount per customer more than 20M VND in a day must have at least one strong auth method - per 2345/QĐ-NHNN 2023
Transaction type constraints - Transaction-specific field requirements must be satisfied based on transaction type
